name: Blue-Eyes Pendulum Dragoon
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 LIGHT Omni monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. During your Main Phase: You can destroy 1 card on the field, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher LIGHT Omni monster from your hand or GY. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 LIGHT Omni monster from your GY or destroy 1 card in your Pendulum Zone; negate the activation of a card or effect, and if you do, destroy that card. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can place it in your Pendulum Zone.
pendulum_text: Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher LIGHT Omni monster from your hand or GY, but its effects are negated, and it cannot attack this turn. If you control a LIGHT Omni monster: You can destroy 1 card in your Pendulum Zone; negate the activation of a card or effect, and if you do, destroy that card. If you have another Omni Pendulum monster in the other Pendulum zone this card has its pendulum scale increased by 1. You can only use each Pendulum Effect of "Blue-Eyes Omni Dragoon" once per turn.
